macro_markets.query: What are the most important macroeconomic and stock market news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major index movements, Fed/central bank news, and significant company earnings or announcements.

items.title: US Stock Markets Open 2026 Strongly with S&P 500 Up 0.41%
items.summary: The US500 (S&P 500) rose to 6887 points, gaining 0.41% on January 5, 2026, following a 16% annual gain in 2025. Dow Jones closed 0.54% higher at 48322 points on Friday, led by Boeing and Caterpillar gains.

items.title: Hang Seng Index Surges Above 26,000 on AI Optimism in China
items.summary: Hong Kong's Hang Seng Index advanced 2.8% on its first trading day of 2026, breaking above 26,000 fueled by artificial intelligence developments. It delivered 28% returns in 2025, its best since 2017.

items.title: Nasdaq 100 Gains 0.61% Amid Range-Bound Trading
items.summary: The US100 (Nasdaq 100) rose 0.61% to 25359 points on January 5, 2026, struggling to break above 25,830 resistance. It remains range-bound between 24,600 and 25,830 after 20% gains in 2025.

items.title: Dow Jones Rises on Core Sector Strength Despite Tech Pullback
items.summary: US stocks closed mostly higher in the first session of 2026, with Dow gaining on core economy sectors amid uncertainty over AI capital expenditure pledges. Notable movers included Boeing (+4.91%) and Salesforce (-4.25%).

items.title: S&P 500 Eyes Bullish Momentum with Q4 Earnings and Inflation Data Ahead
items.summary: S&P 500 locked in 16% gain for 2025 despite year-end slip, with January packed with Q4 earnings and key inflation reports. Technicals suggest potential pullback but overall bullish outlook.

crypto_news.query: What are the most significant cryptocurrency and blockchain news from the past 24 hours? Include major price movements, regulatory news, and notable project developments.

items.title: Bitcoin Traders Bet on Rally Above $100,000 as 2026 Begins
items.summary: Bitcoin traders are placing bets on a price rally exceeding $100,000, kicking off the new year with optimism amid tightening price action above key pivots.

items.title: Bitcoin Price Breakout Signals Potential $100K Target in January
items.summary: Bitcoin is tightening above a reclaimed pivot with expanding volatility pushing toward a pressure zone, raising prospects of reaching $100,000 this month.

items.title: Crypto Market Mixed with BROCCOLI714 Up 49%, VIRTUAL 22%, FET 15%
items.summary: Major cryptocurrencies show mixed performance on January 5, with standout gainers BROCCOLI714, VIRTUAL, and FET leading the outperformers.

items.title: Bitcoin Ends 2025 Down 6% but 2026 Outlook Bullish with Crypto-Friendly Policies
items.summary: Bitcoin closed 2025 approximately 6% lower, yet experts anticipate a strong 2026 driven by a supportive White House and institutional adoption of digital assets.

ai_news.query: What are the most important artificial intelligence and machine learning news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include new model releases, company announcements, research breakthroughs, and industry trends.

items.title: Intel Launches Core Ultra 300 'Panther Lake' Chips at CES 2026
items.summary: Intel officially launched its Core Ultra 300 chips, built on 18A (2nm) process, promising major performance gains for running large AI models on laptops. This highlights the shift to on-device AI processing.

items.title: Nvidia Showcases Blackwell Ultra and DRIVE Thor for Physical AI at CES 2026
items.summary: Nvidia highlighted Blackwell Ultra chips and DRIVE Thor platform for autonomous vehicles, emphasizing physical AI integration in robotics and vehicles. CES 2026 underscores agentic AI moving into everyday systems.

items.title: AMD Unveils Ryzen AI 10000 Processors at CES 2026
items.summary: AMD showcased Ryzen AI 10000 processors optimized for AI tasks like generative video editing and real-time translation, focusing on energy efficiency. Key themes include robotics, on-device AI, and ambient wearables.

items.title: CES 2026 Spotlights Shift to Agentic AI and Physical Robotics
items.summary: Major firms like Nvidia, Intel, Samsung, and LG demonstrate AI in robots, chips, vehicles, and home devices, signaling a move from software to tangible, independent AI systems. Upcoming: Sony-Honda AFEELA EV and humanoid robot pricing.

gaming.query: What are the most notable video game and gaming industry news from the past 24 hours? Include game releases, announcements, esports, and industry developments.

items.title: Upcoming Nintendo Switch Games for January 2026 Announced
items.summary: A new video highlights several Nintendo Switch titles launching in January 2026, including Fairy Tail: Dungeons, The Legend of Heroes: Trails beyond the Horizon, Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake, and Cult of the Lamb: Woolhaven. These releases feature a mix of major franchises, remakes, and indie games shaping early 2026 gaming.

items.title: Ampere Analysis Names Four Games Ripe for TV or Movie Adaptations
items.summary: Research firm Ampere Analysis identifies Baldur’s Gate III, Black Myth: Wukong, Hollow Knight: Silksong, and Sons of the Forest as top video games with strong potential for big-screen or TV franchises due to their popularity, recent releases, and distinctive worlds.

tech_news.query: What are the most important technology news and developments from the past 24 hours? Include major product launches, company news, and significant tech industry developments. Exclude AI-specific news.
